pages.text: On the Shop, some items may have "Requires Permit Tier:" under them. This means you need to unlock the associated $(l)trade permit$() before you can trade them. Trade permits are items that can give you the permission to buy/sell items under an account. Different trade permits give you access to different permit tiers. To use a trade permit, simply open the shop, switch to the account you want to unlock,

and shift-click the trade permit. Please note that permits only unlock the trades for the account you had selected, for more accounts you will need to craft more permits.$(br)Note: permit '0' is just the default, meaning no permit is needed
